website_summaries.verdict: The Asus A88XM-E is a good basic motherboard for an AMD A8 or A10 APU, and delivers a decent feature mix for users uninterested in overclocking, but excited by support for legacy gear.

customer_reviews.title: Easy build, stable, nice basic feature set.
customer_reviews.text: Great motherboard. I already built a computer using one of the previous editions to this motherboard (A88XM-E). I liked it so well when it was time to upgrade one of the other computers in the house I bought the Asus A88XM-E. Both installs went beautifully, both booted up the first time I turned them on. I guess there are several features of each motherboard that would allow me to overclock the computers but I never mess with trying to eek out minor performance gains. I enjoy the stability of the recent builds and not having to mess with them to keep them running in tip top shape.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Good match with an A6-7400K
customer_reviews.text: Good match with an A6-7400K. Mine came with Bios version 401 which was a big plus! After a lot of research I discovered that the Kaveri line up has really hit and miss support on Mobos. Always check with the manufacture's website for best results. I neglected to do this on my first Mobo purchase and wound up with a serious idle temp problem (was running 60-70 C). Picked this board up as the replacement and idle temps are now between 34-40 C with an aftermarket CPU cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great motherboard, I mated it with an AMD A8 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great motherboard, I mated it with an AMD A8 7600 cpu and slimline case. The only problem is with the rebate. Sent everything in a week after receiving it and was notified they didn't get the proof. Called Asus and faxed copies including a copy of certificate of mailing from post office on June 23. Called again June 25 and told to check back the end of the month. Their website still claims proof hasn't been sent. Will keep you posted. Update: I called ASUS again about the rebate and they have approved it; however the tracking number was changed. Changing my rating to 5 while I wait for the rebate. As for the motherboard I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: great motherboard
customer_reviews.text: A little info if your looking to be able to overclock the gpu at hardware level youll need the full atx pro of this board the micro version does not have it and i must say i was dissapointed. Plenty of options for the cpu and memory but not the gpu.
customer_reviews.author: StevenWR

customer_reviews.title: but after a lighting struck the telephone lines looks like it jumped from the phone to the DSL modem
customer_reviews.text: Yes is 2016 and I just bought one of these, but after a lighting struck the telephone lines looks like it jumped from the phone to the DSL modem, then to my PC... only the MoBo died; so I had to look for the last of these (haha). Worked great right out of the box, i really like this MoBo.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great little computer for small factor PC building
customer_reviews.text: Great little computer for small factor PC building. I put mine in a server chasis and built an audio workstation with it. It has all the features I needed for my DAW and has great cooling options if you install Asus AI Suite.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great Motherboards
customer_reviews.text: Replaced several motherboards with these. All of them are still working great. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick Bedoya

customer_reviews.title: but not to bad.
customer_reviews.text: The BIOS is intuitive, reflash was difficult for updating to the latest version, but not to bad.
customer_reviews.author: kristopher weaver

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the 7850k amd apu and it work amazing. Only has only one case fan port besides ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the 7850k amd apu and it work amazing. Only has only one case fan port besides the cpu fan so get some molex to 3 or 4 pin if you want more case fans.
customer_reviews.author: moses

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great motherboard. Great BIOS. Worked as expected. Use with AMD A-Series APUs.
customer_reviews.author: Need 4 Speed

customer_reviews.title: Great media center motherboard
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with an A10-7870K and works great in my media center PC.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ascio

customer_reviews.title: Good board. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: No Problems with installation. Drivers are stable. Very small footprint. I would recommend this board.
customer_reviews.author: Donald G.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BOARD (READ FOR A NOTE)
customer_reviews.text: This motherboard gave me no problems my specs: AMD ATHLON X4 860K CPU (compatible right out of the box) Asus GTX 750 TI GPU 8GB ram 500W PSU NOTE! When I plugged everything, my pc turned on but there was nothing on the screen so to get to the bios screen you have to take one ram out and then power it on, you can then put the ram back in Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Arbaz K.

customer_reviews.title: good luck ever getting a dime from these people
customer_reviews.text: The motherboard seems to function okay, my concern is with ASUS as a company. They claim there was a $15 rebate on this, good luck ever getting a dime from these people.
customer_reviews.author: John Boggs

product_meta.title: ASUS Micro ATX DDR3 2400 NA Motherboard A88XM-E
product_meta.description: FM2+ socketed motherboard features high-endurance 5X Protection and new UEFI BIOS on the A88X chipset
feature_bullets: ASUS 5X Protection - All-round protection provides the best quality, reliability, and durability
New UEFI BIOS - Friendlier, easier, and more intuitive with helpful info added
USB 3.0 Boost (UASP Support) - 170% faster transfer speeds than traditional USB 3.0
AI Suite 3 - One-Stop access to innovative ASUS features
